message: Beyond the door is an area that seems composed entirely of massive arcades.
The buildings are black, decorated here and there with simple lines and electric lights.
It feels unreal, like we're inside a game.
Almost everyone we see on the street is our age. At a glance, you wouldn't think they were any different from the guys in the Old Residential District.
But looking closer, I realize that they're wearing clothes no one back home would ever be able to afford.
Above us, stars sparkle in the sky. Now there's something you can't see in the Old Residential District.
Both the weather and the time of day are artificial in Platinum Jail. I've heard it's almost always night inside.
Supposedly the idea is to make it feel like a party every day, or make it more relaxing or something...
But the most prominent thing in the sky is the tower窶付he symbol of Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's Oval Tower..."
I've heard the rumors, but this is my first time seeing it.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is kinda amazing."

name: ノイズ
message: "Really? Seems normal to me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not normal..."
While I'm gaping at the sights, Noiz looks as bored as could be.
Oh right, wasn't there something else written on the invitation? I still haven't gotten around to reading it.
I open it up on my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's a map attached."

name: 蓮
message: "It's a map of Platinum Jail."
Ren sticks his head out of my bag.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's this mark supposed to mean?"

name: 蓮
message: "That must be where we're staying."

name: 蒼葉
message: "The invitation comes with a hotel, apparently. Why don't we go check it out?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I guess if you like walking into traps."
The thought has occurred to me...
But we can't let that stop us. We have to keep going.

name: 蒼葉
message: "We jumped into the trap the second we set foot in Platinum Jail. We've gotta keep moving."

name: ノイズ
message: "Hmph. Well, whatever. Guess I'll tag along."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Suit yourself. Ren, can you give us directions?"

name: 蓮
message: "Understood."
Frustrated with Noiz's arrogant bullshit, I turn my back and start walking.
